becauseitisjohnnydepp 161038881512 "2017-05-25 00:19:01 GMT" http://becauseitisjohnnydepp.tumblr.com/post/161038881512/spoiler-free-i-went-to-the-premiere-of-the-new "johnlock-empire:The movie was …. Fucking amazing.  We got to know a lot more of Jack’s backstory
column2: many old friends and objects returned
column5: the after credits scene was really cool. It was full of little jokes but it was still shocking and sometimes sad
column6: so the usual PoTC atmosphere. It didn’t seem forced at all. It had the cliché heteromance™ because which one doesn’t
column7: but it was awesome even tho it was the 5th episode
column8: and many movies don’t even succeed at making an enjoyable 2nd
column10: but this sure did. 10/10 would recommend!" False text

column1: becauseitisjohnnydepp 161033836422 "2017-05-24 21:29:16 GMT" http://becauseitisjohnnydepp.tumblr.com/post/161033836422/imafanofeverypartofyoulove-i-saw-pirates-of-the "imafanofeverypartofyoulove: I saw Pirates of The Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales last night. Wow. I can honestly say that is the best movie I have seen in a long time
column3: ever. It was also the funniest. Oh my god I’m so emotional about it. If you’ve kept up with the series
column4: even if you didn’t watch the 4th one
column5: definitely go see this one. Not only will you love it
column6: but the better the movie does in box office
column7: the sooner they’ll get a sequel out there (which is already on IMBD and has a 2019/2020 rumored release date). If you haven’t kept up with the series but you want to see this you need to watch the first three at least because you will be so confused if you don’t (and helllo the first three are AMAZING) so yeah go see it I’m not going to spoiler anything but if you’ve kept up with the movies there are some BIG twists coming. And DONT forget to stay for the after credits scene.  tl;dr Go see Pirates of the Caribbean 5 it was so good watch the first three if you haven’t or you’ll be confused and don’t forget to stay for the after credits scene. " False text
